snippet: Virat Kohli’s red-hot bat powered India past South Africa in Mirpur, Bangladesh, and into Sunday’s World Twenty20 final against Sri Lanka.
abstract: India defeats South Africa, moving on to face Sri Lanka in the final of the World Twenty20 cricket tournament.
lead_paragraph: Virat Kohli’s red-hot bat powered India past South Africa in Mirpur, Bangladesh, and into Sunday’s World Twenty20 final against Sri Lanka.
